detaileddescription.para: Cast an opaque stream pointer into a pointer to a PaUtilStreamRepresentation.
Cast an opaque stream pointer into a pointer to a PaUtilStreamInterface.
Non host specific data for a stream. This data is used by pa_front to forward to the appropriate functions in the streamInterface structure.

memberdef.argsstring: (PaUtilStreamInterface *streamInterface, PaError(*Close)(PaStream *), PaError(*Start)(PaStream *), PaError(*Stop)(PaStream *), PaError(*Abort)(PaStream *), PaError(*IsStopped)(PaStream *), PaError(*IsActive)(PaStream *), PaTime(*GetTime)(PaStream *), double(*GetCpuLoad)(PaStream *), PaError(*Read)(PaStream *stream, void *buffer, unsigned long frames), PaError(*Write)(PaStream *stream, const void *buffer, unsigned long frames), signed long(*GetReadAvailable)(PaStream *stream), signed long(*GetWriteAvailable)(PaStream *stream))
memberdef.name: PaUtil_InitializeStreamInterface

param.type: PaError(*)(PaStream *stream, const void *buffer, unsigned long frames)

detaileddescription.para: Initialize the fields of a PaUtilStreamInterface structure.

Dummy Read function for use in interfaces to a callback based streams. Pass to the Read parameter of PaUtil_InitializeStreamInterface.
An error code indicating that the function has no effect because the stream is a callback stream.

Dummy Write function for use in an interfaces to callback based streams. Pass to the Write parameter of PaUtil_InitializeStreamInterface.
An error code indicating that the function has no effect because the stream is a callback stream.

Dummy GetReadAvailable function for use in interfaces to callback based streams. Pass to the GetReadAvailable parameter of PaUtil_InitializeStreamInterface.
An error code indicating that the function has no effect because the stream is a callback stream.

Dummy GetWriteAvailable function for use in interfaces to callback based streams. Pass to the GetWriteAvailable parameter of PaUtil_InitializeStreamInterface.
An error code indicating that the function has no effect because the stream is a callback stream.

Dummy GetCpuLoad function for use in an interface to a read/write stream. Pass to the GetCpuLoad parameter of PaUtil_InitializeStreamInterface.
Returns 0.
Clean up a PaUtilStreamRepresentation structure previously initialized by a call to PaUtil_InitializeStreamRepresentation.
Check that the stream pointer is valid.

simplesect.para: Returns paNoError if the stream pointer appears to be OK, otherwise returns an error indicating the cause of failure.

briefdescription.para: Stream interfaces, representation structures and helper functions used to interface between pa_front.c host API implementations.
